thread.title: Fitch Publishes U.S. Diversified Industrials and Capital Goods Dashboard
thread.title_full: Fitch Publishes U.S. Diversified Industrials and Capital Goods Dashboard

title: Fitch Publishes U.S. Diversified Industrials and Capital Goods Dashboard
text:
Tip : Use comma (,) to separate multiple quotes. Learn more... 
Thu, Aug 20, 2015, 22:24 BST - UK Markets closed Fitch Publishes U.S. Diversified Industrials and Capital Goods Dashboard Press Release : Fitch Ratings – 17 minutes ago Print 
CHICAGO--(BUSINESS WIRE)-- 
The document explores key themes and trends affecting the credit profiles of diversified industrial and capital goods companies, including the impact of slower growth in emerging markets, low oil prices, currency movements, and demand trends for capital equipment. The report also comments on several pending acquisitions and divestitures. 
A complete review of these topics is in the dashboard which is available at www.fitchratings.com or by clicking the link below. 
Additional information is available at ' www.fitchratings.com '. 
Related Research 
--U.S. Midstream Services Dashboard (July 1, 2015) 
--U.S. Natural Gas Pipelines Dashboard (July 1, 2015) 
Diversified Industrials/Cap Goods Dashboard 
https://www.fitchratings.com/creditdesk/reports/report_frame.cfm?rpt_id=867854 
ALL FITCH CREDIT RATINGS ARE SUBJECT TO CERTAIN LIMITATIONS AND DISCLAIMERS. PLEASE READ THESE LIMITATIONS AND DISCLAIMERS BY FOLLOWING THIS LINK: HTTP://FITCHRATINGS.COM/UNDERSTANDINGCREDITRATINGS . IN ADDITION, RATING DEFINITIONS AND THE TERMS OF USE OF SUCH RATINGS ARE AVAILABLE ON THE AGENCY'S PUBLIC WEBSITE ' WWW.FITCHRATINGS.COM '. PUBLISHED RATINGS, CRITERIA AND METHODOLOGIES ARE AVAILABLE FROM THIS SITE AT ALL TIMES. FITCH'S CODE OF CONDUCT, CONFIDENTIALITY, CONFLICTS OF INTEREST, AFFILIATE FIREWALL, COMPLIANCE AND OTHER RELEVANT POLICIES AND PROCEDURES ARE ALSO AVAILABLE FROM THE 'CODE OF CONDUCT' SECTION OF THIS SITE. FITCH MAY HAVE PROVIDED ANOTHER PERMISSIBLE SERVICE TO THE RATED ENTITY OR ITS RELATED THIRD PARTIES. DETAILS OF THIS SERVICE FOR RATINGS FOR WHICH THE LEAD ANALYST IS BASED IN AN EU-REGISTERED ENTITY CAN BE FOUND ON THE ENTITY SUMMARY PAGE FOR THIS ISSUER ON THE FITCH WEBSITE.
